short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a Google Calendar link to gencon event pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GenCon event pages currently do not have an "add to calendar" button. This adds a text link to add an event to google calendars.

GitHub is here: https://github.com/theonetruemango/gencon-calendar-extension
